actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930, to increase the ceilings on license fees, remove the exemption from branch fees, and increase the level of damages claimed which entitles a respondent to an opportunity for oral hearing.

summary.text: Amends the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act of 1930 to: (1) increase license fee ceilings; (2) eliminate the branch fee exemption; and (3) increase the oral hearing damage threshold.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930, to increase the ceilings on license fees, remove the exemption from branch fees, and increase the level of damages claimed which entitles a respondent to an opportunity for oral hearing.
